testCase.title: App2App - 10 pairings - 25 small messages per pairing in 10 sec to local end-point

specReference.name: HBBTV
specReference.specSection: When either client sends a WebSocket message, consisting of one or more protocol frames, the terminal, upon receipt of each frame, shall immediately relay its contents to the other client via the corresponding WebSocket connection and maintaining the same payload type. [...] When messages sent by all clients across all currently paired connections are considered in aggregate then, during a 10 second period, the terminal shall be able to relay any of the following rates of traffic when spread evenly across up to 10 paired connections: [...] * 250 messages with a payload size of up to and including 512 bytes sent by the client connected to the local service end-point (25 frames via each paired connection)

testCase.assertionText: When a HbbTV application has 10 paired connections with 10 companion screen applications, and the HbbTV application sends one text message with a size of 512 bytes every 400ms to each single connection over a period of 60 seconds the terminal shall immediately relay every text message either as fragmented or unfragmented frames to the corresponding companion screen application.

testStep.procedure: Create a reference to the HbbTVCSManager embedded object
Obtain the local app2app URL from the HbbTVCSManager instance by calling getApp2AppLocalBaseURL()
Obtain the remote app2app URL from the HbbTVCSManager instance by calling getApp2AppRemoteBaseURL()
Attempt to open 10 local app2app Websocket using the app2app local base URL and the app end-point
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The 'onopen' event is fired for the local Websocket

testStep.procedure: Attempt to open 10 remote app2app Websockets
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The onOpen callback for each Websocket is called

testStep.procedure: Wait for 'pairingcompleted' message to be received on the local Websocket
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The 'pairingcompleted' message is received once on each local Websocket

testStep.procedure: Wait for 'pairingcompleted' message to be received on all of the remote Websockets
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The 'pairingcompleted' message is received once on each remote Websocket

testStep.procedure: Send a 512 byte message on each of the local sockets, every 400ms seconds for 60 seconds
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The messages should be received on the corresponding paired remote Websockets

testStep.procedure: Check that the messages received on the remote Websockets exactly match the messages sent from the corresponding paired local Websockets
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The recevied messages exactly match the sent messages

testStep.procedure: Check that the total number of messages received on the remote websockets matches the number of messages sent from the local Websockets
testStep.expectedBehaviour: The total number of messages sent matches the total number of messages received

testCase.passCriteria: A HbbTV application with 10 paired connections to 10 companion screen devices correctly relays all messages sent from it to the companion screen devices via their corresponding connections. Each companion screen application received a text message with a size of 512 bytes every 400ms seconds over a period of 60 seconds.
